channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Black Friday : suivez en direct les meilleures offres du week-end (Amazon, Fnac, Darty…)
item.description: Le vendredi est passé, la poussière est retombée. Mais le Black Friday ? Il est loin d'être terminé. Amazon, Fnac, Darty et les autres jouent les prolongations tout le week-end. On reprend le direct pour vous dénicher les derniers stocks et les offres oubliées.

item.title: This affordable but effective smart air purifier is even cheaper for Black Friday
item.description: Pick up this well-performing air purifier for less with this Black Friday deal at Amazon.

item.title: Save $200 on the best Android phone with this Black Friday OnePlus 13 deal
item.description: The OnePlus 13 is down to just $699 this Black Friday, and as well as being the best Android phone you can buy, it’s one of the best Black Friday deals you can buy.

item.title: ‘Angel’s Egg’ Still Embodies Anime’s Wonderous Ability to Move Without Words
item.description: Mamoru Oshii’s cult classic original video anime, a haunting, wordless vision, returns to theaters in 4K for its 40th anniversary.

item.title: You can get a four-pack of AirTags for just over $60, the lowest price ever
item.description: Traveling can be chaotic, especially during the holidays. If you’re planning to hit the road before the end of the year, Apple’s AirTag makes for an excellent travel companion. Right now, you can pick up a four-pack of AirTags for an all-time low of $62.99 (about $36 off) at Amazon, Walmart, and Best Buy. You […]

item.title: ChatGPT turns 3 on Sunday – here's how far it’s really come and where it’s heading next
item.description: Three years after launch, ChatGPT has quietly transformed from a fun experiment into a powerful, multimodal AI assistant – without becoming the AGI some predicted.

item.title: 20 Best Black Friday Deals at Best Buy (2025) on Hot Tech
item.description: Best Buy is rolling out really great deals on some of our favorite tech that we've tested this year.

item.title: TCL and Hisense TVs are the stars of Black Friday, and they're getting incredible discounts alongside these other brilliant mini-LED sets
item.description: Some of 2025's top TVs are mini-LED TVs. They define value for money, and are getting awesome deals for Black Friday.

item.title: VPN support lands on next-gen Amazon Fire TV Sticks – but only two VPNs are ready
item.description: The Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K Select finally got the needed update to support VPN apps. Only NordVPN and IPVanish are ready – and they are both on sale.

item.title: Ne payez plus le stockage Apple : ce dock Ugreen transforme votre Mac Mini M4
item.description: Vous avez acheté le nouveau Mac mini M4 et vous avez réalisé deux choses : les ports sont derrière et le stockage coûte un rein. Ugreen a la solution. Leur station d'accueil 11-en-1, qui fait aussi boîtier pour disque dur externe, passe à 64,99 €. C'est l'outil parfait pour "hacker" la politique tarifaire d'Apple.

item.title: The Garmin Forerunner 55 is selling out, but it's cheaper than ever at Boots
item.description: This cheap Garmin Forerunner is seeing a last-minute price crash, and I'd recommend you get it.

item.title: All the best Black Friday VPN deals LIVE: reviewed by our VPN experts
item.description: It's Black Friday! All afternoon I'll be bringing you live updates, exclusive insights and the very best Black Friday VPN deals.

item.title: 160+ Amazon Black Friday deals: Find record-low prices on AirPods, Kindles, Lego, and LG TVs
item.description: Amazon Black Friday 2025 is officially here, and you can buy Fire TVs starting at $99. Shop record prices on Kindle, Bose, Lego, and Apple products.

item.title: 130+ best Black Friday deals: We found record prices on Apple Watches, OLED TVs, Legos, and Kindles
item.description: See the top Black Friday deals on Apple products, Dyson vacuums, Sony headphones, and Legos. Save $250 on MacBooks, 27% on Kindles, and 55% on Amazon devices.

item.title: The 174 best Black Friday deals we’ve found so far — a ton of tech is over half off
item.description: Now that the Thanksgiving dishes are put away and the last slice of pie is hidden in the back of the fridge, it’s time to turn your attention to the next major holiday: Black Friday. The biggest shopping day of the year has started, and as expected, there are tens of thousands of deals staring […]

item.title: L’iPhone 16 Pro Max est bradé pour le Black Friday
item.description: C'est l'offre que personne n'attendait sur un produit sorti il y a un an. Le tout-puissant iPhone 16 Pro Max tombe à 1 099 € chez Darty avec le code BF30. Ajoutez à cela 90 € crédités sur votre compte fidélité, et vous tenez le deal Apple du Black Friday.

item.title: That's not very trendy of them - AI browsers can be hacked with a simple hashtag, experts warn
item.description: HashJack allows attackers to hide malicious commands in URL fragments, influencing AI browsers without detection and bypassing traditional security measures.

item.title: 9 pouces, 165 Hz, puce de PC de bureau : la fiche technique de la console-PC Ayaneo Next 2 est absurde
item.description: La course à la puissance ne s'arrête jamais. Alors que GPD et OneXPlayer misent sur des batteries externes pour alimenter la monstrueuse puce AMD Strix Halo, Ayaneo choisit une autre voie. Avec sa Next 2, la marque promet d'intégrer cette puissance brute dans un châssis tout-en-un doté d'un écran 165 Hz. Le résultat risque d'être lourd. Très lourd. ...

item.title: These 3 portable projector Black Friday deals at Amazon are too good to miss
item.description: Portable projectors are getting great deals in Amazon's Black Friday sale. Here are 3 models we've reviewed that are worth checking out.

item.title: Pulsetto’s vagal nerve stimulator is on sale for Black Friday
item.description: Help manage stress and aid your sleep cycle with this advanced vagal nerve stimulator.

item.title: 50 Black Friday tech deals Id recommend to friends and family as a tech editor: Bose, Samsung, DJI, PS5 on sale
item.description: Our tech editor handpicked the best Black Friday tech deals. Save $330 on Dyson vacuums, $250 on MacBook Air laptops, and up to 55% on Amazon devices.

item.title: Twelve South’s magnetic PowerBug charger is 20 percent off for Black Friday
item.description: My favorite deals are often on gadgets that pull double duty — like the Twelve South PowerBug, which is currently on sale for the first time for Black Friday. The handy charging accessory, which can turn any wall outlet into a miniature MagSafe charging station, is available for just $39.99 ($10 off) from Amazon and […]

item.title: Apple, Google required to provide digital ID tools under Missouri age verification law – but are they ready?
item.description: Missouri's law is set to further fuel the debate around age verification and privacy. Digital IDs could be good for security if well-implemented, but Big Tech giants aren't quite ready yet.

item.title: Stocks limités : les meilleures offres tech Cdiscount du Black Friday sont ici
item.description: Tout le monde regarde Amazon. C'est une erreur. En ce vendredi de Black Friday, Cdiscount est souvent plus agressif sur les TV 4K et les PC portables. On a épluché le site ce matin : beaucoup de bruit, beaucoup de "fausses promos", mais quelques vraies pépites incontournables.

item.title: Best T-Mobile Black Friday deals 2025: expert picks on the iPhone 17, Galaxy S25, Google Pixel 10, and more
item.description: My expert picks for today's best T-Mobile Black Friday deals, including iPhones, Android, and even cheap internet plans.

item.title: Ma Fabrique à Histoires à ce prix ? Amazon brade le cadeau sans écran n°1 des enfants pour le Black Friday
item.description: C'est le cadeau qui sauve les trajets en voiture et les couchers difficiles. La célèbre Lunii "Ma Fabrique à Histoires" passe sous la barre psychologique des 50 € grâce à un coupon Amazon. À 47,90 € pour l'édition limitée Océan, c'est le moment de stocker pour Noël.

item.title: Black Friday 2025: Live updates on the latest deals from Amazon, Target, Walmart, and more
item.description: Get live updates on Black Friday sales. We found savings of $150 on Dyson Supersonic hair dryers, $300 off Samsung TVs, and record prices on AirPods.

item.title: The cheapest 85-inch TV weve seen this Black Friday is a TCL Roku TV under $500
item.description: The most affordable big screen TV of Black Friday 2025 is an 85-inch TCL Roku 4K TV for $498. It's not QLED, but it is massive.

item.title: Black Friday stocking stuffer deal: Ankers MagGo Power Bank is 30% off at Amazon
item.description: iPhone users should hop on this deal, as the Anker MagGo power bank is optimized for Apple phones.

item.title: DJI ban: how the world’s biggest dronemaker is getting shoved out of the US
item.description: December 23rd, 2025. That’s the day DJI will automatically be banned from the United States — unless Trump steps in. You’ll still be able to fly your existing DJI drones and film with existing Osmo cameras. But DJI will be barred from importing any new products into the US, and the FCC can retroactively ban […]

item.title: DualSense PS5 : le meilleur prix « ever » pour la meilleure manette du marché
item.description: La manette DualSense PS5, habituellement vendue 70 € ou 75 €, vient de toucher son prix plancher absolu chez E.Leclerc.

item.title: Black Friday : voici les 10 offres tech qui ont survécu à la matinée et méritent vraiment votre argent
item.description: Il est midi passé. Le premier rush du Black Friday est terminé. Le bilan ? Beaucoup de ruptures, beaucoup de fausses promos, mais quelques résistants héroïques. On a refait le tour des marchands pour vous sortir le Top 10 ultime de la mi-journée.

item.title: Le Black Friday démarre fort : voici le TOP 100 des meilleures offres ce vendredi 28 novembre 2025
item.description: Entre les offres en avant-première, les promos du 11.11 ou encore la Black Week, le mois de novembre a été assez mouvementé en offres. Mais, ce n'est pas fini : le Black Friday débute officiellement ce vendredi avec de nouvelles offres dans sa besace. Nous avons fait le tri des meilleures promotions Tech, faites vous plaisir !

item.title: Score the Kindle Paperwhite Kids for its best price ever and get extra savings when you buy two
item.description: Not only is the Kindle Paperwhite Kids on sale for a record-low price on Black Friday, but you also save an extra $20 when you buy two.

item.title: The Best Black Friday Beauty Deals, WIRED Approved (2025)
item.description: Name a better time to stock up on beauty bargains—I'll wait.

item.title: Will Amazon refund you if Black Friday prices drop further? Here’s the answer – and how other retailers compare
item.description: Some retailers in the US and the UK will give you money back if something you've bought then gets a further discount.
